Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Multiple people have shared news about the Reserve Bank of Australia's potential for its biggest shake-up in decades. The RBA has received criticism for lifting interest rates multiple times and its handling of the COVID-19 pandemic. Treasurer Jim Chalmers has given in-principle support to 51 recommendations to reshape the bank with changes intended to improve the RBA's ability to handle future crises. However bipartisan support is essential in maintaining the bank's independence from political influence ensuring public confidence in the bank's functioning remains intact.
